physical_appearance: "The image shows a drawing. It is rectangular in shape. The background of the drawing depicts a roofed building. There are two trucks in front of the building. One of the trucks carry workers on its rear end. The other truck has a crane attached to its rear end. The foreground of the drawing contains numerous boats. The signature and year, ""Tan. 1979"" is stated at the extreme left hand side. There is a vertical line of Chinese characters
creator_1: Tan, Choon Ghee, 1930- Tan, Choon Ghee
subject_terms_1: at the extreme left hand side.   " trucks boats workers
subject_terms_2: buildings (structures) Singapore Buildings Boats and boating Trucks Employees
